pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot looking up at an ornate, domed ceiling. The dome features a large, green stained-glass section at its center, surrounded by intricate carvings and a ring of lights. A large, elaborate chandelier hangs from the apex of the dome.
